note:
Believes in inclusiveness. Freedom and equality for all who respects the ideal of freedom and equality for all.

Likes to play with and promote Free/Libre software, hardware and other things that level the platform for every one.

Spends time learning about, tinkering with and fixing stuff while fussing about minimalism and tidiness which doesn't really go together always.

Interested in a lot of things since this pale blue dot has a lot of things in and out of it.
